TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update and exchange the HostilityStatusCode information of an Organisation in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Organisation with a specific HostilityStatusCode. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the HostilityStatusCode of the Organisation. Nation B receives and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Organisation (and Unit) message schema area ('Ground Picture > Forces' for instance). Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated HostilityStatusCode of the Organisation is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a message element for an Organisation with HostilityStatusCode AssumedNeutral.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the HostilityStatusCode for this Organisation to Friend.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Organisation with the new HostilityStatusCode correctly.
